name: ITR's Player Tracer
author: ITR
description:
Adds nameplate colored lines between you and every other player in the world (ctrl+t).
For more info read the [README](https://github.com/ITR13/ITR-sPlayerTracer/blob/master/README.md)
changelog:
Swapped Ui to purely use VRChatUtilityKit
Added option to remove the new ui tab
